name: Battle Arena Toshinden 3 [PSX]
description:
The Toshinden: the timeless battle tournament where only the best are invited, and only the strongest survive. Now, this third installment takes fighting action to a level never seen before!
You're caged like an animal in newly designed and closed in arenas. Battle to the exhausting finish against over 30 sexy, bloodthirsty and deadly characters, each with their own weaponry, style and moves. Plus fast fresh graphics, unbelievably smooth gameplay and responsive controls makes this tournament the ultimate force to be reckoned with.
